data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
I’m leaning towards REIT but want to hear the argument. Let’s say I’m deciding between 2 options:

Buy property $1.5M assume no loan, nets $90k per year or 6% dividend. Property will appreciate over time.

Buy a REIT $1.5M worth and get 3% dividend or $45k per year. REITs historically appreciate 10% average per year.

Sure I might make an extra $45K per year building the property, but is that worth over REIT? I assume property and REIT will appreciate at the same rate.
